disregard_cowards.name: Disregard Cowards
disregard_cowards.effect: If a 1 is rolled in a ranged attack against you, ignore the attack.

retaliation.name: Retaliation
retaliation.effect: Once per round, if an enemy has done damage to you this round, take advantage on an attack against them.

shrug_it_off.name: Shrug it Off
shrug_it_off.effect: Once per round, you can choose to take 2 standard damage rather than 1 crit damage.

second_wind.name: Second Wind
second_wind.effect: Once per day you can recover 2d6 standard health instantly.

hard_to_kill.name: Hard to Kill
hard_to_kill.effect: If you are reduced to 0 HP but not killed outright, flip a coin. If heads, you stay standing with 1 crit health.

unstoppable.name: Unstoppable
unstoppable.effect: Ignore the effects of a number of [stun], [injury], [poison], [bleed], conditions up to your STR score. Ignore these in the order you receive them. Statuses must still be resolved or removed normally.

vanguard.name: Vanguard
vanguard.effect: Enemies attack with disadvantage if they are within your melee range but they are not attacking you.

dead_sprint.name: Dead Sprint
dead_sprint.effect: Once per round you can pay 1 AP to move three times your movement speed in a straight line. If you attack at the end of this movement, take advantage

improved_interrupt.name: Improved Interrupt
improved_interrupt.effect: Once per round, you can "interrupt" for free.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.effect: Spend 1 AP. For the rest of the round, attacks against you have disadvantage. This ends if you take a different action

fancy_footwork.name: Fancy Footwork
fancy_footwork.effect: On a successful attack, you can choose to move 1 space.

running_on_empty.name: Running on Empty
running_on_empty.effect: Raise your to-hit difficulty by 1 while you are holding no AP.

reflex.name: Reflex
reflex.effect: Gain 1 Temp AP the first time an attack against you misses during a round.

blood_in_the_water.name: Blood in the Water
blood_in_the_water.effect: If the enemy has any of the following status effects: [bleed], [stun], [poison], [prone], or [vulnerable], double any dealt crit damage. If they are not aware of you, triple it instead.

assassination.name: Assassination
assassination.effect: Deal 1 crit damage ignoring armor on 6 or when you have advantage.

duelist.name: Duelist
duelist.effect: Once per round, if an enemy leaves your threatened area, gain 2 Temp AP.

aggression.name: Aggression
aggression.effect: Gain advantage on your melee attack if your last action moved you closer to your opponent.

slasher.name: Slasher
slasher.effect: On a successful attack, the next attack costs 1 fewer AP. You can use this once per round.

devastating_strike.name: Devastating Strike
devastating_strike.effect: Add your to_hit to your damage. You can do this once per round. State you will do this before the attack.

basher.name: Basher
basher.effect: On 6, pick one effect: If B, [stun] or "Push". If Bashing: [injury], [prone] or "Rend".

sweep.name: Sweep
sweep.effect: Your attacks are able to hit 2 neighboring enemies. Make only one attack roll.

decisive_strike.name: Decisive Strike
decisive_strike.effect: Once per round, you can double your to-hit bonus. State you will do this before the attack.

efficiency.name: Efficiency
efficiency.effect: Treat your STR as 1 point higher for the purpose of attacks, weapon requirements, etc.

giant_killer.name: Giant Killer
giant_killer.effect: Your first attack in a round costs 1 AP.

spearman.name: Spearman
spearman.effect: On 6, choose one effect: "Push", "Rend", "Bypass", or deal 1 crit daamge.

expert_positioning.name: Expert Positioning
expert_positioning.effect: Treat the reach of your melee weapons as increased by 1.

outreach.name: Outreach
outreach.effect: If your opponent is in your threatened range and you are not in theirs, gain advantage on attacks against them.
